text: my name is kevin perry from alexandria
virginia
i earned my masters of business
administration and data analytics
from the illustrious delaware state
university as a first generation 2019
college graduate
during my tenure had the honor of
serving as the third team mr delaware
state university
making me the first student-athlete to
hold an executive position
dsu has allowed me to be the agent of
change for my family and community
there are currently only four black ceos
of a fortune 500 company
i aspire to one day become the fifth
while continuing to serve as a mentor
and a positive representation for black
men currently i am a consultant for a
global accountant firm
and i strive to be the first choice for
employers in the global market
the core values of dsu diversity
integrity scholarship
community and outreach has helped mow me
into the man i am today
i wasn't born in king but this
university made me one
you
